title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 135.3 - Action to be taken by court
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 135.3 - Action to be taken by court

State Regulations

Article 21-A does not provide for any action to be taken by
a court with respect to the issuance of a restricted license. A court shall
continue to perform all functions relating to sentencing, suspension or
revocation of a driver's license and the forwarding of a certificate of
conviction to the Department of Motor Vehicles upon a conviction in accordance
with the provisions of the Vehicle and Traffic Law as if article 21-A had not
been enacted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
135.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
